name: Mini Football
description:
A new free Football game.

4 Playable characters

Instructions :

QD (AD) : Move

Space : Jump

E : Shoot

Double space or E in air : Roll Shoot

Available on Windows and Android

You can subscribe to my youtube channel to receive news on my future creations.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCggm5QWeoYQJX0nXQaon8Zg

Thank you !!
